disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: "BioSynthonos" is a theoretical modeling tool for informational and educational purposes only. The simulations are based on a deterministic, rule-based engine and do not constitute medical advice. The use of performance-enhancing substances carries significant health risks. Always consult with a qualified healthcare professional before making any decisions regarding your health, diet, or training. The creators of this tool are not liable for any actions taken based on its output.

profile.title: Athlete Profile
profile.bloodwork_subtitle: Or manually enter your pre-cycle blood work to calibrate the simulation.
profile.history_placeholder: e.g., family history of heart disease, pre-existing high blood pressure...

profiles.title: Profile Management
profiles.prompt_name: Enter a name for this profile:
profiles.alert_delete_default: The Default profile cannot be deleted.
profiles.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the profile "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

results.welcome_subtitle: Your virtual athlete awaits. Configure the protocol on the left and click "Run Simulation" to generate an instantaneous, deterministic analysis.

summary.manageable: with manageable health risks during the cycle.
summary.significant: but this carries <bold>significant health risks</bold> that will peak mid-cycle.
summary.critical: but this comes at the cost of <bold>critical health risks</bold> during the peak of the cycle.

physique.gain_and_lose: gain {{muscleGain}} kg of muscle and lose {{fatLoss}} kg of fat

synthesis.summary: Over this {{duration}}-week protocol and subsequent PCT, the simulation projects you could {{physique, nested}}. The model indicates that your health markers will be most impacted mid-cycle, {{risk, nested}} A recovery phase is crucial.
synthesis.long_term_outlook: Continued use of such protocols without extended breaks will likely lead to chronic cardiovascular strain and potential permanent endocrine changes. The recovery phase post-PCT is as important as the cycle itself. Regular, comprehensive health screenings are critical to mitigate long-term risks.

warnings.cardio: <bold>Peak Cardiovascular Risk:</bold> At its peak, this cycle will severely impact your lipid profile (HDL/LDL) and likely increase blood pressure, placing significant strain on your cardiovascular system. This risk is amplified by your genetic predispositions.
warnings.hepatic: <bold>Peak Liver Strain:</bold> The selected compounds will cause significant liver strain, with liver enzymes (ALT/AST) predicted to be highly elevated, especially if oral steroids are used.
warnings.renal: <bold>Renal Strain:</bold> The protocol places a notable strain on the kidneys, indicated by a drop in eGFR. Long-term monitoring is crucial.
warnings.endocrine: <bold>Severe HPTA Shutdown:</bold> Your natural testosterone production will be completely shut down during the cycle. The simulation shows a recovery period is essential, but full recovery is not guaranteed and depends on a proper PCT.
warnings.hair_loss: <bold>High Hair Loss Risk:</bold> Due to your genetic sensitivity and the high androgenic load of this protocol, there is a significant risk of accelerating male pattern baldness.
warnings.general: <bold>General Well-being:</bold> While peak risks appear moderate, any use of anabolic substances carries long-term health implications. Consistent monitoring throughout the cycle and PCT is key.

recommendations.cardio: <bold>Cardiovascular Support:</bold> To mitigate severe lipid damage, high-dose Omega-3s (3-4g EPA/DHA daily) and Citrus Bergamot are strongly recommended throughout the cycle.
recommendations.cardio_missing: <bold>Cardiovascular Support:</bold> To mitigate severe lipid damage, high-dose Omega-3s (3-4g EPA/DHA daily) and Citrus Bergamot are strongly recommended throughout the cycle. You are <bold>not</bold> currently taking Omega-3s.
recommendations.hepatic: <bold>Liver Protection:</bold> TUDCA and NAC are essential to protect your liver, starting from week 1. Do not neglect this.
recommendations.hepatic_missing: <bold>Liver Protection:</bold> TUDCA and NAC are essential to protect your liver, starting from week 1. Do not neglect this. You are currently taking <bold>neither</bold> of these critical supports.
recommendations.pct_missing: <bold>Post-Cycle Therapy:</bold> You have not defined a PCT. This is <bold>extremely risky</bold>. A proper PCT with a SERM (like Nolvadex or Clomid) is critical to help restart your natural hormone production.
recommendations.pct_defined: <bold>Post-Cycle Therapy:</bold> Follow your defined PCT protocol strictly. Post-cycle blood work (4-6 weeks after PCT ends) is non-negotiable to confirm hormonal recovery.
recommendations.monitoring: <bold>Monitoring:</bold> Get blood work done before the cycle, mid-cycle (around week 6-8), and after PCT to track these predictions against reality and adjust accordingly.

errors.title: Error
errors.unknown_simulation: An unknown error occurred during simulation.
errors.ai_invalid_suggestion: The AI returned an invalid or empty suggestion. Please try again.
errors.unknown_suggestion: An unknown error occurred while fetching the suggestion.
errors.ai_api_key_invalid:
### AI Analysis Failed

**Error:** The provided API Key is invalid or missing. Please ensure it is correctly configured in the application's environment variables.
errors.ai_analysis_failed:
### AI Analysis Failed

**Error:** Could not retrieve analysis from the AI model. The service may be unavailable, the request may have been blocked, or there was a configuration issue. Check the browser console for more details.
errors.ai_api_key_invalid_suggestion: The AI API Key is invalid. Please check your configuration.
errors.ai_suggestion_failed: Could not retrieve suggestion from the AI model. The service may be unavailable or blocked.

ageGate.title: Age Verification
ageGate.disclaimer: This tool simulates complex physiological responses to pharmacological protocols for scientific and educational purposes only. The content is intended for a mature, adult audience and deals with topics that may not be suitable for all ages.
ageGate.confirmationQuestion: Do you confirm that you are 18 years of age or older?

share.text: Check out my BioSynthonos simulation results!

lab_import.confirm_subtitle: Please verify the AI-extracted data. You can edit the values before applying them. Unrecognized markers will be ignored.
lab_import.error_file_size: File is too large. Please select a file smaller than 4MB.
lab_import.error_file_read: Could not read the selected file.
lab_import.error_no_markers: The AI could not find any recognizable markers in the document.
lab_import.error_generic: An unknown error occurred during the import process.
lab_import.error_camera: Could not access the camera. Please check permissions.
lab_import.success_applied: Imported lab results have been applied to your baseline.
